name: Exploding Penguins
description:
Exploding Penguins is an experimental prototype silly game, where two sides fight each other to death (and yes, they are penguins!). initially you start with 0 budget, tho once you gather enough money you can start buying new units. The units are always "clamped" to a rate of a maximum of 40% special units and 60% basic penguin units.

**IMPORTANT : In the current state of the game you are only allowed to buy units and see them fight, any ideas on how we should proceed with this :P ?***IMPORTANT 2: THIS IS AN EXPERIMENTAL WIP GAME **

Meaning, you are most likely to encounter several bugs, also that the game "concept" is not finished, its just an idea, a prototype, so at the end of the road this game can be very, VERY different of what it is now, so we will be open to ANY, ANY feedback you could give us :), Deadlycrow Games is growing to be a company that makes games WITH and FOR the community! so yeah! your words are really important for us!,  that said, we hope you like this silly little game :) !!
